response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its unique features and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,300,000. I am confident this price reflects its true worth while allowing us to reach a fair agreement. Please let me know if you require any additional information or if you wish to discuss this further. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1300000}
